


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->

# ```js requestAnimationFrame ```


Proxy for the window.requestAnimationFrame function

## Parameters

- **cb**  Function: The function to call when it's time to update your animation for the next repaint



## Example (js)

```js

```
